dimensions: parts a & b) 7.3h x 19 diameter cm (2 7/8 x 7 1/2 in. )
title: Cup and saucer
description:
The cup is conical with a flat base and a small looped white handle. Around the rim is 
has faint blue and purple stripes. The body has an alternating pattern of blue and purple curved 
lines and red and yellow stripes. The saucer has a similar alternating pattern, although it is 
spaced further apart.
name: Cup and saucer
